Partial sentence without proper

Bullet points with no context:
• First item
• Second item with [brackets] and {curly braces}
• Third item with "quotes" and 'apostrophes'

JSON-like text that isn't valid JSON:
{
  "key": "value",
  another_key: "another value",
  "broken_array": [1, 2, 3,
}

Sentences with unusual  multiple    spacing and line
breaks in the middle of

Sentences with special characters: é, ñ, ç, ß, 漢字, ‡, §, ¢.

1. Numbered list
2. With some items
3. That might be confused as enumerations

Code-like blocks:
```python
def hello_world():
    print("Hello, world!")
```

<html>
  <p>HTML-like tags that might confuse parsers</p>
</html>
